title: Remarks on The Squam Lake Report: Fixing the Financial System
content: For release on delivery  5:45 p.m. EDT  June 16, 2010      Remarks on The Squam Lake Report:  Fixing the Financial System         Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     The Squam Lake Conference     New York, New York                 June 16, 2010
